text: Skazhi [, Mukhammad]: "Ne povedat' li mne vam o tekh, kogo ozhidayet yeshche khudsheye ot Allakha, o tekh, kogo proklyal Allakh i na kotorykh On razgnevalsya, kogo obratil v obez'yan i sviney i kto poklonyalsya Tagutu? Imenno im ugotovano naikhudsheye mesto [v budushchem mire] - ved' eto oni sbilis' s pryamogo puti
